classTranscendencePerks.name: Experienced Fighter
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases the dmg targets take by 20%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Excellent Strategy
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases CC ACC of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional CC ACC applies.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Battle Cry
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases HP of all allies by 15%. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 5% additional HP applies.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Shield of Protection
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Block Rate is increased by 200 and CC resistance is increased by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Swift Move
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases ATK Spd by 200 and ACC by 400.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Opportune Strike
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Warlike
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Per each enemy, ATK is increased 7% and CC Resistance is increased by 30. Can be stacked up to max 10 times.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Offensive Guard
classTranscendencePerks.effect: ATK rises equal to half of P.DEF and received P.DMG is decreased by 15%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Tactical Foresight
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Dodge rate is increased by 200 and takes 10% reduced DMG.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Blood Wrath
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases Lifesteal by 200 and ATK Spd by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Target Weakness
classTranscendencePerks.effect: ATK rises by 20% and DEF Penetration rises by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Swift and Nimble
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Per every sec, Dodge rate is increased by 100. This effect can be stacked up to max 5 times, and resets upon dodging an Attack.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Tactical Foresight
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Dodge rate is increased by 200 and takes 10% reduced DMG.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Opportune Strike
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Vital Detection
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Upon attack, causes the target to take 10% increased All DMG and have their ATK Spd reduced by 100 for 10 sec. This effect activates once every 3 sec.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Precision Shot
classTranscendencePerks.effect: ATK rises by 20% and ACC rises by 400%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Eagle Eye
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases all allies DEF Penetration by 150 and ACC by 75. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional DEF Penetration and 25 additional ACC apply.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Mortal Wound
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Successful Crit Attack reduces enemy recovery rate by 50% and deal Physical continuous DMG every second equal to 20% ATK. Does not stack.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Opportune Strike
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Concentration
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Every 5 sec, increases own Crit DMG by 4%. This effect can be stacked up to max 25 times and is irremovable.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Target Weakness
classTranscendencePerks.effect: ATK rises by 20% and DEF Penetration rises by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Ready Cannons
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Mana recovery per second rises by 62.5% per enemy.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Pressure Point
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Crit chance increases by 400.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Special Bullet
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Attacked target loses 15% of ATK and 150 of crit. Chance. Does not stack.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Amplified Gunpowder
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases Crit DMG of all allies by 30%. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 10% additional Crit DMG is applied.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Deception
classTranscendencePerks.effect: When receiving DMG, becomes immune to the next 3 hit of DMG. This effect is activated every 40 sec.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Moral Rise
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases ATK of all allies by 15%. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 3% additional ATK applies.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Blessing of Mana
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Mana recovery per second rises by 250%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Circuit Burst
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Receives 15% more DMG but gains 40% ATK. ACC is increases by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Destruction
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases Crit Chance by 200 and DEF Penetration by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Vengeful Curse
classTranscendencePerks.effect: When hit by an enemy, attacker's DMG is reduced by 70% for 3 sec. This effect only activates once in 40 sec, and cannot be dispelled.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Goddess Blessing
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases Crit Chance of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional Crit Chance applies.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Inner Peace
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Heal all allies by 1% every sec and increases CC Resist by 75. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 0.3% additional healing per sec and 25 additional CC Resist apply.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Blessing of Mana
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Mana recovery per second rises by 250%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Swiftness
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases ATK Spd of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional ATK Spd applies.
